title: Worke, more vvorke, and a little more work for a masse-priest Reviewed and augmented by the authour. VVith an epistle of an vnknowne priest remaining in London, sent to the authour, excepting against fiue points therein. With the authours answere thereunto: returned vnto the priest within twelue dayes after the receipt of the priests exceptions. ...
author: Cooke, Alexander, 1564-1632.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by William Iones, dwelling in Red-crosse-street,
